nodes.description: 埃及周日逮捕一名试图在以色列实施自杀式袭击的潜在袭击者
nodes.support_text: Egyptian security forces on Sunday arrested a would-be suicide bomber in north Sinai, who had left a note for his parents saying that he intended to carry out a suicide attack inside Israel.

nodes.description: 周一早晨伊斯兰圣战组织成员在Eilat面包店自杀式爆炸致3人死亡
nodes.support_text: Islamic Jihad suicide bomber blew himself up in a bakery in the southern resort city of Eilat, killing three people Monday morning.

nodes.description: 袭击前七分钟以色列军方预备役中将Waltinsky因怀疑袭击者可疑报警
nodes.support_text: Waltinsky then telephoned the police station in the town and said that he suspected the man was a terrorist. Two patrol cars rushed to the scene, but seven minutes after Waltinsky made the call, the bomber carried out the attack.

nodes.description: 警方确认爆炸装置重量4-8公斤并封锁现场
nodes.support_text: Police believe that the explosive device weighed between 4-8 kilograms. Police cordoned off the area.

nodes.description: 哈马斯谴责袭击称其为对以色列政策的'自然回应'
nodes.support_text: Hamas movement said the attack was a 'natural response' to Israel's policies.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰圣战组织声称袭击者从加沙经约旦走私进入以色列
nodes.support_text: Islamic Jihad said the bomber... reached Eilat via Jordan, after seven months of preparation.

nodes.description: 以色列军方确认袭击者经埃及西奈半岛进入以色列
nodes.support_text: the Islamic Jihad suicide bomber... entered Israel through the border with Egypt, several dozen kilometers northwest of Eilat.

nodes.description: 警方和军方推测Eilat可能存在更多袭击者
nodes.support_text: Eilat police chief Bruno Stein said they believed there could be more bombers in the city.

nodes.description: 确认三名遇难者身份包括Haim El-Maliach等
nodes.support_text: three people and the bomber were killed.

nodes.description: 伊斯兰圣战称袭击者经七个月准备其家人确认执行任务
以色列总理Olmert与Eilat市长通话
nodes.support_text: Prime Minister Ehud Olmert said he had spoken to Eilat Mayor Meir Yitzhak Halevi.

nodes.description: 以色列媒体确认爆炸由炸弹引发排除气体泄漏
nodes.support_text: the explosion had been caused by a bomb, and not a gas leak.

nodes.description: 该袭击成为伊斯兰圣战在Eilat的首个自杀式爆炸事件
nodes.support_text: This was the first ever suicide bombing in the city.

nodes.description: 以色列将应急响应级别提升至最高
nodes.support_text: emergency services raised their alert level to the highest.

nodes.description: 军方确认袭击者提前数日步行进入Eilat
nodes.support_text: he entered Israel several days ago, and made his way to Eilat on foot.

nodes.description: 以色列平民无意中驾驶炸弹袭击者接近袭击现场
nodes.support_text: 以色列平民无意中驾驶炸弹袭击者接近袭击现场

nodes.description: 以色列平民向警方报告
nodes.support_text: 以色列平民向警方报告

nodes.description: 以色列国防军高级军官向《哈雷特兹》报报道
nodes.support_text: 以色列国防军高级军官向《哈雷特兹》报报道

nodes.description: 炸弹袭击者离开加沙北部
nodes.support_text: 炸弹袭击者离开加沙北部

edges.support_text: three people and the bomber were killed.
seven minutes after Waltinsky made the call, the bomber carried out the attack.
Police cordoned off the area, and Eilat police chief Bruno Stein said they believed there could be more bombers in the city.
Police believe that the explosive device weighed between 4-8 kilograms.
entered Israel through the border with Egypt
Based on the examination of the bomber's body, it appears he entered Israel several days ago, and made his way to Eilat on foot.
This was the first ever suicide bombing in the city.
emergency services raised their alert level to the highest.
炸弹袭击者接近现场后七分钟发生爆炸
平民报告后军方开始调查
军方报道后哈马斯发表声明
炸弹袭击者离开加沙北部后经约旦走私进入以色列
